manifest.name: workbox-broadcast-update
manifest.description: A service worker helper library that uses the Broadcast Channel API to announce when a cached response has updated
manifest.readme: This module's documentation can be found at https://developers.google.com/web/tools/workbox/modules/workbox-broadcast-update
